declarations.name: DotLottiePlayer

members.name: renderer
members.description: Renderer to use (svg, canvas or html)

members.name: _handleSeekChange
members.description: Handles click and drag actions on the progress track

members.name: getLottie
members.description: Returns the lottie-web instance used in the component

members.name: snapshot
members.description:
Snapshot the current frame as SVG

If 'download' is true, a download is triggered in the browser

members.name: freeze
members.description:
Freeze animation.
This internal state pauses animation and is used to differentiate between
user requested pauses and component instigated pauses.

members.name: styles
members.description: Return the styles for the component
